title: Managing Main and Member Accounts
content:
For localized version, please visit the links below: üáπüá≠ Thailand: [TH_[‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠] ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ç‡∏ä‡∏µ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ç‡∏ä‡∏µ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏ä‡∏¥‡∏Å](https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/TctQdJBd3obVedxZlz2lUCN8gob) üá≤üáæ Malaysia: [MY_[User Manual] Mengurus Akaun Utama dan Ahli](https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/QkoYdihRJoR2cNxyrtqllXCTgjh) üáÆüá© Indonesia: [ID_[User Manual] Mengelola Akun Pengguna dan Akun Anggota](https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/VPjWdFtJHoqICpxd62Il2zPKgSd) üáªüá≥ Vietnam: [VN TSP_Qu·∫£n L√Ω T√†i Kho·∫£n Ch√≠nh v√† T√†i Kho·∫£n Th√†nh Vi√™n tr√™n TTSPC](https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/H68bdPBobojCCDxRY5NlkL7Ng8f) # [EN] Managing Main and Member Accounts In this article, we will give you a quick guide on how to add member accounts and assign different roles and permission to provide you with more flexibility and help you manage different member accounts more effectively.
# Overview Prior to this update, the lack of member account features presented challenges in team operations and scaling up. Taking this into account, we've introduced an account management feature, enabling you to set up the main account and assign roles to team members for enhanced efficiency. * **Main Account:** The main account serves as the administrator, having control over all member accounts. The main account administrator can create, preview, and edit member accounts for any users. * **Member** **Account:** A member account is created by the main account. The main account can generate multiple member accounts and assign different roles to staff, each with unique permissions for daily operations, such as managing data or overseeing creators/sellers.
# Benefits of Adding Main and Member Accounts * **Improved Security:** Assigning member accounts and roles enhances security by granting limited access on a need-to-know basis, reducing the risk of unauthorised use and data breaches. * **Streamlined Workflow:** By assigning specific roles, team members can focus on their specific responsibilities and partner roles, promoting efficiency and preventing confusion over tasks. * **Enhanced Flexibility:** By assigning roles, team members can work independently using individual member accounts, helping you manage your business more efficiently.
# How to Add Member Accounts and Assigning Roles To create and assign member accounts to different roles, begin by defining a role and its permissions. Then, assign this role to your member accounts. Follow these step-by-step instructions for guidance. ## Customizing Role Permissions 1. Navigate to [My Account > Team Members](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/approval/team-management)**.** Under **Added Roles** tab, click **'Add New Role.'**
2. Set the role name and choose role permissions by selecting the checkbox for each module. Once completed, click **'Confirm'** to finish the setup.
3. To edit roles you've created, return to the **Added Roles** tab, select the role you wish to edit, and click **'Edit.'** Then, follow the previous steps to assign role permissions. The changes will be applied to all member accounts under that role.
## Adding Member Accounts 1. To assign roles to your member accounts, first create a member account. Go to [My Account > Team Members](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/approval/team-management)**.** Under the **Team Member Accounts** tab, click **'Add Team Member Account.'**
2. Enter the team member's email and assign the appropriate role to their account. After completion, click **'Add New Role.'**
3. The platform will send an activation email to the member's account email, which must be activated within 120 hours. After activation, the member account can log in to the Partner Center.
If the activation email expires, the main account can click **'Resend Email'** to send the activation email again.
## Log in with Member Accounts After clicking on the invitation link in the email, you will be redirected to the Partner Center, where you can sign up for a member account. You'll then be able to log in using a subaccount associated with your registered email or phone number. **Please note:** 1. Each email or phone number can be linked to only one subaccount or one main account. 2. Ensure you log out of any existing accounts in the Partner Center before logging in with your new member account. Failing to do so may result in an "unmatched" error. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/df2be87afd644ef890e27a1ab51a06ec~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ## Editing Member Accounts 1. If you made a mistake and need to edit the account, you can do so if the account status is **'Pending'** and the member hasn't activated the activation email. Go to [My Account > Team Members](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/approval/team-management)**.** Under the **Team Member Accounts** tab, select the email of the member account you wish to edit.
2. Click the edit icon next to the email address and enter the new email. The platform will automatically send an activation email to the new member account email for activation. ## Deleting Member Accounts 1. To delete a member account, go to [My Account > Team Members](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/approval/team-management)**.** Under the **Team Member Accounts** tab, select the email of the member account you wish to delete and click the delete icon.
# FAQ 1. **Can I directly assign permissions to a member account?** No, you can only assign roles to a member account. The member account will then inherit all the permissions associated with the roles assigned to it. 2. **How can I change the member account email if it has been changed/invalid?** If you made a mistake and need to edit the email, you can do so if the account status is 'Pending' and the member hasn't activated the activation email. Go to **My Account > Team Members.** Under the **Team Member Accounts** tab, click the edit icon to update the email for a particular member account. The activation email will be sent again to this new email. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/26f0555604a343d1b0f1841c954d5466~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c1a24944c67a4447aa5189e8931524f1~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) 3. **Will my newly added category certification and feature permissions be granted to member accounts automatically?** No, for new features, you need to add permissions and grant them to member accounts separately. 4. **What if my main account has been terminated by the platform? Could I still use my subaccountÔºü** No, member account permission will be invalid if the main account has been terminated. 5. **I cannot access Seller Center while using Shop Analytics on Partner Center. What should I do?** If you are unable to access Seller Center while using Shop Analytics on Partner Center, please note that you won't be able to access Seller Center using your member account. To gain access to Seller Center, please contact the main account for assistance.
